member.name: CERT_TRUST_LIST_INFO
member.summary: The CERT_TRUST_LIST_INFO structure that indicates valid usage of a CTL.

member.name: CERT_TRUST_LIST_INFO.cbSize
member.summary: Size of this structure in bytes.

member.name: CERT_TRUST_LIST_INFO.pCtlEntry
member.summary: A pointer to a structure that includes a subject identifier, the count of attributes associated with a CTL, and an array of those attributes.

member.name: CERT_TRUST_LIST_INFO.pCtlContext
member.summary: A pointer to a CTL context.
